directions: Toss the carrots, pepperoni, almonds, and lettuce together in a bowl; top with the Parmesan. Drizzle the lemon juice and vinegar over the salad. Scatter the croutons over the salad. Spread the Caesar dressing over the top. Sprinkle the oatmeal over the salad to serve.
title: Carrot Pepperoni Caesar Salad
